text: Chetan Prakash Bhagat (born 22 April 1974) is an Indian author, columnist, Bollywood screenwriter, He honoured as Time magazine's list of World's 100 Most Influential People in 2010. == References == Category:21st-century Indian writers Category:Columnists Category:Indian screenwriters Category:Indian essayists Category:Indian journalists
title: Chetan Bhagat
